travel_to_everbright.title: TUTORIAL - Travel to The Everbright
travel_to_everbright.description: Light the portal in the Gatekeep, but make sure it is for Everbright

20enemies_everbright.title: Slay 20 Enemies in The Everbright
20enemies_everbright.description: This new place is much more harsh. New possibilities, new enemies. Get acquainted.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Very good! I have heard about some towers around that the inhabitant owns special powers. See if you can find any.

locate_everbright_blinding_dungeon.title: Find a Blinding Dungeon
locate_everbright_blinding_dungeon.description: I have been informed that the habitant is possessing unique items.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: This is quite the place. Lurk around for keys to open the gate towards the owner.

loot_blinding_key.title: Find a Blinding Dungeon Key
loot_blinding_key.description: Search in the tower for a key. You need it to open the gate towards the Summoner

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Try to get to the Summoner, if one is not enough, you might need more.

slay_summoner.title: Slay The Summoner
slay_summoner.description: The Summoner will use his magic against you. Take care.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Looks like he is dropping over some bags. See if you can find anything new.

loot_ethernal_arc.title: Find an Ethernal Arc
loot_ethernal_arc.description: Arcs are powerups for your character. Ethernal Arc is found in the Summoner loot bag.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: These arcs can be used instead of keys to respawn the Summoner and fight it again. Maybe we can find better loot.

place_summoning_table.title: Get a Summoning Table
place_summoning_table.description: Summon and slay The Summoner until you find a Summoning Table and put it on the ground.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: The table can be used with the Summoning Tome and Soul Fragments to produce magic.

get_diopside_backpack.title: Get a Diopside Backpack
get_diopside_backpack.description: Craft a Diopside Backpack to carry even more items with you roadming the world.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Great! Did you knew you can upgrade your backpack to feed you while you fight?

25combatlvl.title: Reach Combat Lvl 25
25combatlvl.description: Fight enemies to raise your combat level to at least 25.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Your combat skills are improving. Keep it up!

get_tier_2_power_up.title: Get Yourself a Stronger Powerup 2
get_tier_2_power_up.description: Powerups are armor trim materials that enhance your gear with various stats. Type /powerups to find out more about it

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Great! Apply those to your armor to become stronger!

locate_everbright_nature_dungeon.title: Find a Nature Dungeon
locate_everbright_nature_dungeon.description: Nature dungeons are massive mazes multiple stories high. Big and green. That`s how you find them.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: What a masterpiece of a maze. Find 4 Nature Keys and get to the top.

loot_4_nature_key.title: Find 4 Nature Keys
loot_4_nature_key.description: Search the maze for keys. You need it to open the gate towards the Alchemist

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Now you are ready to ender the fight. Good luck traveler!

slay_starlit_crusher.title: Slay The Starlit Crusher
slay_starlit_crusher.description: The Starlit Crusher is at core a tree evolved, so axes might be more useful.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Good job. Open the bag to see what goods we get

loot_nature_arc.title: Find a Nature Arc
loot_nature_arc.description: Nature arcs gives you the possibility to wistand more damage before dying

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Very good! Equip it to become stronger. Remember, you could get a better one from the enemy

28combatlvl.title: Reach Combat Lvl 28
28combatlvl.description: Fight enemies to raise your combat level to at least 28.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Your combat skills are improving. Keep it up!

travel_back_to_overworld.title: Travel back to the Overworld
travel_back_to_overworld.description: Get back home as we need to find the next adventure. Remember: /dimensions

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Welcome back home, but adventure continues
